ExtraContent.div: This will be your new 2-factor authorisation token. You will need a smart-phone app such as Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator to generate the verification codes.
You need to supply a verification code now to install the token

You are changing an existing token and will have to input the codes for both the current and the new token. You may find it easier to disable the existing token first, then return to this page to set a new token
